author.description: statement of responsibility from MARC record (100$a in MARC21)

title.description: title (without the subtitle) from the MARC record (245$a in MARC21)

unititle.description: uniform title (without the subtitle) from the MARC record (240$a in MARC21)

notes.description: values from the general notes field in the MARC record (500$a in MARC21) split by bar (|)

serial.description: Boolean indicating whether biblio is for a serial

copyrightdate.description: publication or copyright date from the MARC record

timestamp.description: date and time this record was last touched

datecreated.description: the date this record was added to Koha

abstract.description: summary from the MARC record (520$a in MARC21)

frameworkcode.description: framework used in cataloging this record
